summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 1, 2019. It records the official inmate population count (766 total) and includes a specific entry for an inmate in the H-A (Hospital) unit, which is notable given Jeffrey Epstein's death occurred in that unit on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 766 inmates across various housing units, including one inmate in the H-A (Hospital) unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 1, 2019, nine days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The total inmate population at MCC New York was recorded as 766 on this date.
The count sheet specifically notes one inmate was housed in the H-A (Hospital) unit.
The document is part of routine prison administrative records, showing standard operating procedures for inmate population tracking.
